text: @WhiteHouse "Ultrasonic vibration cell therapy cleaning machine" can treat new coronavirus pneumonia. Doctors who slander and attack physical ultrasonic therapy are all guilty and shameless. My facebook number is blocked by the No Communist spy of Facebook company.
